Description:
--------------
Glee In Karaoke Revolution, gamers can play with their favorite characters including the infamous GLEE Rachel Berry, Finnish football star Hudson, and fearless leader of the Glee Club, Will Schuester.

Implementation of some of the most memorable scenes from the first season, players can belt out up to 35 charts hits and songs from popular TV series. Millions of fans around the country have made a franchise GLEE musical leaders of our time. "Gleeks" young and old now have their chance to rise in your favorite program like never before. In multiplayer games singing Gleeks can sing harmonies or as a duo, creating the kind of performance that can even withstand Sue Sylvester.

As an added bonus, unlockable content will be available in a special game mode where players can access the show memorable moments from the first season. Karaoke Revolution will also use property Glee Karaoke Revolution of voice recognition technology that accurately recognizes and scores players on vocals and rhythm help reach those notes strong and perfect their harmonies.
